name: Running Out The Cluck
description:
Created for the Time Travel Jam (Full Moon Jams #3): https://itch.io/jam/time-travel-jam-fmj

------------------------------
There's been an accident in the temporal logistics lab! Chickens from a farm on this same land a hundred years ago have been thrown into our present.  They appear to be moving backwards in time, pulled to their original continuum. 

Try not to cross their paths, as it could create a paradox and enrage the chickens (chickens HATE paradoxes).

You’ve got a temporal gun, which should momentarily shunt them forward, clearing their timeline.

Somewhere in the lab is the computer controlling the experiment- shut it down. 

Also, management told us to lock the door behind you.  Good luck!

------------------------------
CONTROLS

WASD to move
Mouse to look
Left mouse button to shoot.

------------------------------
CREDITS
A game by Misdirection Games.

Music and SoundFX courtesy of Rob Tunstall, https://soundcloud.com/robtunstall/Gun model by Delthor Games, https://delthor-games.itch.io/gun-pack
Chicken sample by desuperanton, https://freesound.org/people/dersuperanton/

Other assets free on the Unreal Engine Marketplace :)
